Welcome to ``afwf_shell`` Documentation
==============================================================================
Documentation for ``afwf_shell``.


.. _install:

Install
------------------------------------------------------------------------------

``afwf_shell`` is released on PyPI, so all you need is to:

.. code-block:: console

    $ pip install afwf-shell

To upgrade to latest version:

.. code-block:: console

    $ pip install --upgrade afwf-shell
